abstracts.cdata!:
The Poverty Reduction Support Credit
            (PRSC) for Albania develops and implements fiscally
            sustainable policies within the framework of the
            Government's three-year Growth and Poverty Reduction
            Strategy (GPRS, or National Strategy for Economic and Social
            Development) that supports a higher quality of
            life--especialy for the poor, and that is consistent with
            and supportive of the country's overall growth
            strategy. This operation supports more effective and
            efficient policy formulation and implementation, improved
            access to social services and better targeting of scarce
            fiscal resources to those most in need, and policies
            conducive to sustained growth. The PRSC is a single tranche
            adjustment operation.
